newsitem.title: USA: UAL Corp Q3 operating profit rises.
newsitem.headline: UAL Corp Q3 operating profit rises.

text.p: Oper shr $3.58 $2.53
(All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: Earnings on fully distributed basis.
Q3 1996 oper share before charges of $19.0 million for aircraft seat replacement, $12 million for travel agency litigation settlement and $7.0 million for debt retirement.
Q3 1996 net income $3.29 per fully distributed share after $0.14/share charge for aircraft seat replacement, $0.10 charge for travel agency litigation and $0.05 charge for debt retirement.
Q3 1996 operating income after payment of $5.0 million in preferred dividends vs $4.0 million.

Q3 1996 income under generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP) $3.85 a share before debt retirement charge or $0.08 a share, but after aircraft seat charge of $0.21 and travel litigation settlement charge of $0.14. Q3 1995 GAAP income $3.22 a share.
Q3 1996 earnings from operations on GAAP basis $610.0 million vs $467.0 million.
NINE MONTHS
Oper shr $6.64 $4.56
(All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: Operating results on a fully distributed basis.
Nine-month 1996 and 1995 operating earnings per share before extraordinary item and effects of preferred stock transactions.
Nine-month income on GAAP basis $6.45 a share before extraordinary charge for debt retirement and effects of preferred stock transactions vs $5.34 a share a year ago.
Nine-month earnings from operations on GAAP basis $1.07 billion vs $807.0 million.
Reuters Chicago Newsdesk - 312-408-8787
